data.name: AtAGlanceJamiyahDetails
data.value:
(a) Al Jamiah As Salafiah, Narayanganj:
(i) Boys section: Total land area for boys section is 450 decimals. In the boys section, the educational program is going on from class 1 to class XI. With the mercy of Allah, a five-storied residential building has been established, with 10 rooms having 18/20 feet below the floor. A tin-shaded building with 4 rooms is situated on the south-west side of this building. There is a generator room, an employee's residential room and two other storerooms. There is a six-storied residential building for the teachers, the first floor has been completed, and the remaining 5 floors are under construction. There is a plan to build a ten- storied academic building and a six- storied building for the library and research, whose construction work will start in 2019, In-Sha Allah. There is a large field for students to play and to have entertainment. There are 18 teachers among which there are 5 teachers who are serving at the higher level, 9 teachers are serving at the secondary level and 4 teachers are serving in the primary level. It is to be noted that, it started its journey in August 2013 with 35 students and currently has 372 boys.
(ii) Girls section: There have been no arrangements of land for the girls section yet. The girls have been temporarily dwelling in the Tin-shaded residential building containing nine rooms which is made of 15/10 feet brick walls near the boys’ section. Their teaching activities are being conducted in an academic building of 7-room which is Tin-shaded. At present, we are searching for the land for the girls section. If we get a proper place, the girls branch will return to its own campus In-Sha-Allah. The girls section contains seven classes, from class one to class seven. There are 9 female teachers, 205 students, and four employees. After the establishment of the institution Al-Jami'ah As-Salafiah has been receiving the highest scholarship in the PEC Examination from 2015 to 2018 by the grace of Almighty Allah.
(b) Al Jamiah As Salafiah, Rajshahi:
(i) Boys' Section: Total amount of land for the boys’ section is 400 decimals. There is a four-storied residential building with 15 rooms including two stair rooms and a bath in the north-south side of this campus which is situated in a land area of 6500 square feet. There are two academic tin-shaded building near the residential building where 6 rooms are situated at the east-west side and 13 rooms are situated at north-south side. These rooms are being used for educational activities. There is a tin-shaded building of 4 rooms near the brick-road, beside the four-storied building situated towards the south, where there is a store-room, medical center, students' residential rooms and garage. A foundation has been deployed to build up one of the largest mosques in Bangladesh on the land of 85 decimal where 3000 Muslims can perform their prayers together.
(ii) Girls’ Section: The total land area for girls’ section is 133 decimals. In the north-south side of this campus, there is a two-storied residential building with 11 rooms, including a bathroom and a stair room. There is a room at the northern corner of the campus for girls to perform their Salah (prayer) where the classes also run. There is an academic building which has 11-tin-sheded rooms on the east-west side of the campus. There is a tin-covered Hifz-khana and its land area is 3500 square feet. There is a building on the east-west side of the two- storied building, where there are two classrooms, a kitchen, a store-room and a room for the reception.

data.name: DeciplineDetails
data.value: Al-Jamiah As-Salafiah has specific rules and regulations. Students have to obey all the rules and regulations.

data.name: DeciplineDetails2
data.value: "(a) All students will abide by these rules. (b) All students of 'Al-Jamiah' will perform salah in Jamaat. (c) No student can use any electronics device like Mobile, Tab, Computer, MP3, MP4, Radio, Television and Mobile watch etc. These are strictly prohibited. (d) No account can be kept in social media like Facebook, Twitter, What's app, You Tube etc.) (e) If any student escapes or takes a leave from the responsible teacher and does not come back in time, the authority of this institution will not bear any liability for him or her. (f) No student can roam outside after evening and the authority will not take any responsibility when he or she stay outside of the institution. (g) If there is any evidence of consuming drugs against any student, he or she will be expelled from 'Al-Jamiah. (h) No one can participate in any type of program without the permission of the responsible teacher. (i) No student can involve in political parties or in any other organization. If proven, the authority will take actions according to the rules. (j) No student is allowed to go to the market without any important reason. The gate of Al-Jamiah will remain open from Asr to Maghrib. Then the student will do the necessary works. Besides, if he or she needs to go outside in other time, he or she will have to seek permission from the responsible teacher. (k) Every student will have to keep the card of 'Al-Jamiah' or 'Identity Card'. (l) No student can keep money more than the basic needs. A 'Student’s Account' will be opened for the students to deposit extra money. (m) No guests (known or unknown) of the students of Al-Jamiah are allowed to stay in the Hostel without the permission of the responsible teacher. (n) Every student will have to keep his clothes, beds, and rooms clean. Water tap, fountain, electric bulb, fan, switch and other accessories of Al-Jami'ah will have to be used with care by the students. (o) No student is allowed to use the iron, heater, water heater etc. (p) During class, no student can stay in the room or loiter at the balcony. (q) No student can be involved with private tuitions. (r) Every student will have to arrange dinning materials like dish, jug, plate, pot, bowl, glass and bedding according to the session by himself or herself. "

data.name: DirectorIdentityEducationDetails
data.value: At the age of eight, his educational life begins in a local Maktab. He was admitted into Nachol Islamia Madrasa for higher education with Jalal Uddin (Tufani), an intelligent student, in July 1975. There he studied till 1982. At this time, he finished studying one of the books of the hadeeth, Mishkat Sharif. After that, for higher education, he was admitted into Mamba’ul Uloom Madrasah, at Khanpur, Maldah, West Bengal, India in 1983. He studied there till 1984. Then in 1985, after studying for one year in Baluaghat Islamia Madrasa, he again got admitted into Mamba’ul Uloom Madrasa and completed Daura Hadeeths stage. After the completion of Daura Hadeeth, he stayed with Maulana Matiur Rahman and his classmate Abdus Subhan in the month of Ramadan in Budhia, Babupur, Maldah in order to go to Uttar Pradesh to get a higher education. In the middle of 1985, he got admission with them in Madrasatul Masakin, Bahadurpur, Azamgarh and studied there till mid-1986. Then, in 1986, in the city of Mazharul Uloom, City, Banaras, he studied till mid-1987, and from there he got admitted into Darul Uloom Maonathwangan, in Azamgarh and completed Daura Hadeeth again in May 1998. He completed Alim in 1983 and Fazil in 1985 from Calcutta Madrasa Education Board. Later, he successfully passed in Hadeeth from Madrasa Education Board of Bangladesh in 1992. And finally, he achieved first division by studying Tafsir in Kamil in 1994.

data.name: DirectorIdentityServingInIslamDetails
data.value: From the very beginning of his student life he had an excellent habit of delivering Islamic speeches, besides conducting Darash, he also made people aware of Islam through his speech. He is now recognized as a well-known Islamic thinker among Bangla speaking scholars. He is a remarkable member of speech and He used to regularly deliver his speeches and lectures in the Talk show of Dr. Zakir Naik's Peace TV. He has so far participated in Islamic programs in various countries including Saudi Arabia, Dubai, India, and the Maldives. The interesting feature of his statement is that he recites the Arabic Ebarat of Hadeeth from his memory and makes a simple translation. He has memorized so many Hadeeths that people become astonished at his continuous recitation and translation from Hadith. In his two to three-hour speech on certain subjects (topic), there is no place other than Hadeeth and the verses from the Quran. He gives an informative statement to the Muslims regardless of the Majhab and Maslak. Consequently, each of his statements becomes one of the Darshes of Hadeeths.

data.name: DirectorIdentityWorkingLifeDetails
data.value: In May 1988, he started his career joining Gazipur Islamia Madrasah, at Dhulian, Murshidabad, West Bengal, in India as Muhaddis. Then in 20th August 1988, on Wednesday, he joined Al Marakazul Islami Madrsa, in Jannatpur, Gobindaganj, Gaibandha. Later, on 1st September 1997, he joined Al-Marqajul Islami As Salafi, Nawdapara, Paba, Rajshahi as Muhaddis. In 2009, when he was appointed as Acting Principal by the Makraj, he made a great contribution to the development of the education system, boarding system and to the standardization of food of Makhraj and to the infrastructural development of the building within a very short time after taking the responsibility. As a result, Makhraj authority appointed him as the Principal of the institution permanently. After taking the responsibility of the Principal, he emphasized on the standardisation of education and relevant activities. On the very year, the students of Makraj got great success in PSC, JDC, SSC, and HSC examinations. As a result, Makraj became one of the supreme institutions of Bangladesh. He really has this remarkable contribution in improving the Madrasa during his tenure of 18 years, from 1st September 1997 to 17 December 2015. Moreover, he served as a member of Fatwa Board of monthly At-Tahrik magazine from 1997 to 2015, for 15 years. Currently, he is performing the duty of writing 'Fatwa' in monthly Al-'Etisam-e' magazine.

data.name: HistoryOfInstitutionDetails
data.value: (a) The history of Al Jamiah As Salafiah, Narayanganj: A Furkania Madrasha (Religious School) was established in 1954 by the effort of the famous physician Doctor Abdus Subhan in association of some Islam loving brothers because there were no institutions for learning the Holy Quran in that area of Birhatabo, Rupganj, Narayanganj. Afterwards the institution’s name was changed as Amdia Krishak-Sramik Hafizia Madrasha. Due to financial crisis, the institution was closed in 1996. After five long years, in 2001, the activities of the institution restarted. After five years the activities of the institution again got closed due to same reason. But the founder and secretary, Mr. Dr. Abdus Subhan began to search for an Islamic personality who, being an active server, would build up the institution as a world-class one. One day he got introduced to Shaykh Abdur Razzak Bin Yousuf. He came in this area to deliver his speech in an Islamic Conference on 5th July 2013. That time he passed the night in the residence of Mr. Mugal Mia, son of Mr. Musharaf in Deboi village. In the morning, around 6.30 am to 7.00 am, Mr. Dr. Abdus-Subhan met him and proposed to hand over the institution to him. Taking a few days, Shaykh Abdur Razzak Bin Yousuf prayed to the Almighty Allah for help and after consulting with some of the scholars, agreed to accept the proposal to take the responsibility of the Managing Director. After that, he conducted a meeting in 29th July 2013, in the presence of Guljar master. Then he decided to set up an institution (Islamic school). In 2013, 28th April, the name of the institution was changed as Al Jamiah As Salafiah. In 2013, 28th August, Tuesday at 11 am the institution was inaugurated. (b) The History of Al Jamiah As Salafiah, Rajshahi: "From the very beginning, the activities of the Maktab were going on upon the donations of Mr. Akkas Ali Mullah, dweller of South Dangipara, for the purpose of spreading Islamic studies among the children in Dangipara Jame Mosque. In 2008, 26th November, an Imam was appointed at the mosque and he started to teach the children according to the new curriculum, which means according to Tajweed with Holy Quran from 28th November 2008. As a result, the number of the students began to increase who used to come from nearest villages- Birasthoil, Panishail and so on. The number of the students increased so rapidly that some of the students had to go-back home for not getting any seats. Realizing the fact, Mr. Akkas Ali Mullah appointed one more teacher. After that, the educational activities were going on perfectly. In this way, one year passed. Then Mr. Akkas Ali Mullah proposed the Imam to establish a Madrasha in Dangipara in November 2005. The Imam assured him saying “In-Sha-Allah, the Madrasha would continue very well.” After that, in December 2005, he established an institution, named Dangipara Misbahul Ulum Ebtedaye Madrasha on the 73 decimal land donated by him, his mother, his brother and some others’. Then the Madrasha started its journey with 50 students from class one to class three. The institution continued to run as Dangipara Misbahul Ulum Ebtedaye Madrasha till 16th February 2016. The cause of taking responsibility of this institution by Shaiekh Abdur Razzaq Bin Yousuf: Shaykh Abdur Razzak Bin Yousuf was appointed on 1st September 1997 as a Muhaddis in Markajul Islami Salafi, Nowda Para, Rajshahi. Among the teachers of the male section, he was the best teacher of Al-Markajul Islami As-Salafia. His prosperity and acceptance to the teachers and students began to increase day by day. So, the teachers and the students of the institution wanted him to be the Principal from the deepest corner of their hearts. Because the educational activities were being hampered for the want of a competent Principal- and the administrative condition was also going through chaos. In this situation, the authority of Markaz appointed him as the Principal in charge in 2009. As a result, Markaz got back its proper environment for study. The standard of education, the standard of eating in boarding and the standard of the infrastructure of the buildings began to increase. At last, he was appointed as the Principal in 2012 permanently. His wife, Razia Begum was the Principal of female branch. Both the husband and the wife used to work hard for the welfare of the institution. Despite their working hard, they were suspended from their professions in 17th December 2015. At that time, both of them were worried about their life. They were hesitated whether they should establish a Madrasha in Rajshahi or they should move to Al Jamiah As Salafiah, Narayanganj. In the meantime, two persons came from Dangipara. They knew all the information of this incident and consoled him. They proposed him to build up a new Madrasha in Dangipara. Next day, three persons came to him and they also proposed him to build up a new Madrasha. At the third day, four persons came to him and they too proposed him with emphasis to build up a new Madrasha. Then he took time for some days to seek help from the Almighty Allah and he consulted the fact with some scholars. Finally, he agreed to establish a new Madrasha at Dangipara, Paba, in Rajshahi. And by their agreement the name of Dangipara Misbahul Ulum Ebtedaye Madrasha was changed into Al-Jamiah As-Salafiah on Wednesday in 17th February 2016. And It’s foundation was deployed by the grace of Allah Subhan-a-Ta-ala. It’s to be noted that the educational activities of this institution began with the Darsh from Bukhari at 7.00 am on Saturday of 16th July 2016.

data.name: Principal
data.value:
Born: Sheikh Abdur Razzak Bin Yusuf was born in a religious family of Hajirtala village under Maunga box under Devinagar upazila of Chapainawabganj district of northern Bangladesh.
Studying: After studying Maktab in the field of education, he read from Nawabganj Nawabganj Madrasa, one of the books of Hadith, Mishkat Sharif. Then he went to India hoping for higher education and finished Daura Hadith from Darul Ulum Maunathwangan in Uttar Pradesh. He ended the two-day tradition of Dora. Then he returned to the country and took part in the Fazil and Kamil examinations. He passed Kamil in 1st Division with hadith and tafsir.
He started his career by working as a teacher in Al-Marakazul Islami in Jannatpur, Gobindaganj, Gaibandha. Then since 1998, Al-Makarajul Islami As Salafi Noadapara has been serving as a Muhaddis in Rajshahi. He has also served as head teacher in Madras for nearly 5 years. In these five years Madrasah has kept a great deal of success in improving the answer. Besides, he also served as a member of the fatwa board of the monthly At Tahir. At present, he is also managing an organization named Al Jamiatus Salafia.
Din Khidmat: As a student, he used to give a speech from the life of the people, besides giving Daras to him, he was invited to the religion through speech. And now he is recognized as a well-known speaker among Bangla speaking scholars. He also gave regular lectures on Dr. Zakir Naik's Piece TV. He has so far participated in various programs in Saudi Arabia, Dubai, India and the Maldives. The interesting feature of his statement is that he recited the Arabic ebat of Hadith and then translated it. His two-and-a-half thousand hadiths were memorized. He spoke for two or three hours on different subjects, but he did not find any place other than translations of Hadith and Hadith. As a result, each of his statements is one of the Daras Hadith.
He has contributed less than his contribution to the field of writing, so far he has written about ten books. In the meantime, one of the rules is the prayer of the Prophet's Prayer and the Tauzieh al-Quran. Many of his students, who are now in his hand, are now offering the daily sacrifice of the people like Shaikh Muzaffer bin Mohsin, Shaikh Imamuddin bin Abdul Bassi, Shaikh Nurul Islam, Shaikh Abu Taher, Shaikh Abdul Matin Madani, Shaikh Shariful Islam Madani. Besides, there are thousands of people on the verge of Bengal who have repented from all the sins committed by al-Hamdulillah. There are many such young people who, after listening to Shaykh, gave up wearing pants under ankle, and kept the sunnati beard in their mouth. It is to be noted that one of the characteristics of Shaykh's statement is that he gave a special statement to the Muslims regardless of the madhhab and maslak. Especially in regards to Paradise, Hell, Quayamat, ideal family, who have suffered a great loss, etc. Maslak was able to stir the heart of all Muslims irrespective of religion. In order to spread Islamic education in Bangladesh, he established many institutions such as Al-Jamaiatus Salafia, Rupganj Narayanganj, Al Madrasaatus Salafia, Atmal, Bogra, Birkustiya Darul Hadith Salafia Madrasah Bogra. And assist many organizations to move forward. Such as Al-Marqajul Islami As Salafis, Rajshahi and Sallafia Madrasah, Rajshahi.
We do the Dua, Allah blesses Shaikh and gives good light. Amin! Ammun!

data.value: All students will adhere to the rules of Jami'ah. All students of Jama'a'ah will perform Salat in Jama-'at. No student can be involved in political parties or any other organization. If proven, the authorities will take action according to the law. No student can go to the market without much need. From there to Maghrib, the gate of Jami'ah is open. Then the student will do the necessary work. Besides, if the need to go outside, then the responsible teacher will have to get permission. Each student's 'Jami'ah' card or 'identity card' will be kept in full swing. No student will be able to keep extra money with special money. A 'Student Account' will be open for the students to deposit extra money. No student can be allowed to stay in the hostel of 'Jami'ah', even relatives, known-unknown people without the permission of the responsible person.
